data.name: Awesomenauts - Titanium Ted Skin
data.detailed_description:
When things get too hot, Ted rocks his Titanium Marine outfit. This armor has withstood gunfire, acid, solar flares, psionic radiation, power swords, plasma cannons, Zurian butterknives and rabid blowfish during the many battles Ted has fought. The armor comes with air-conditioning, aim assist, onboard battlefield diagnostics, cable television and a built in candy cotton machine. It's time to get TITANIUM.

This DLC contains a custom skin for Ted McPain in Awesomenauts. You need to have Ted McPain available as a playable character in order to access the skin in-game. Owning this skin will also unlock the special portrait for use in-game. This skin contains a fully customized voice set!

data.short_description: When things get too hot, Ted rocks his Titanium Marine outfit. This armor has withstood gunfire, acid, solar flares, psionic radiation, power swords, plasma cannons, Zurian butterknives and rabid blowfish during the many battles Ted has fought.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GB HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, or Windows 10
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX version 10.7 (Lion) or later
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version Lion 10.7 or later.
  • Processor: Any Processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
  • Hard Drive: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other: Broadband Internet connection

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Any processor with 2 Cores
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 512MB, or Intel HD Graphics
  • Hard Disk Space: 3.5 GD HD space
  • Other Requirements: Broadband Internet connection
linux_requirements.recommended:

  • Video Card: AMD or NVIDIA videocard with at least 1024MB
